title: Traits and Features
content: Gaping Wounds for twice as long. Crossbow Expert (Feat) grants this feature. Defensive Duelist Class Feature When attacked while wielding a Finesse Weapon you're Proficient with, you can use a reaction to add your Proficiency Bonus to your Armour Class, possibly causing the attack to miss. All Classes at Level 4 Dual Wielder: Bonus Armour Class Class Feature You have a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wielding a melee weapon in each hand. Dual Wielder (Feat) grants this feature.
